title: After More Than a Month of Fighting, Much of Mariupol Lies in Ruins
content:
1. After More Than a Month of Fighting, Much of Mariupol Lies in Ruins  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Ukrainian governor says Mariupol 'has been wiped off the face of the earth'  The Washington Post
  3. Battle for Mariupol continues  KENS 5: Your San Antonio News Source
  4. Ukrainian governor says city of Mariupol ‘wiped off the face of the earth’  The Hill
  5. WARNING: GRAPHIC CONTENT - Russia presses offensive in ruins of Mariupol  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 1カ月以上の戦闘の後、マリウポルの大部分は廃墟と化した。
经过一个多月的战斗，马里乌波尔的大部分地区处于废墟之中
經過一個多月的戰鬥，馬裏烏波爾的大部分地區處於廢墟之中
